name: Rune of Warding
components: V, S, M (powdered adamantine, diamond, or mithral worth 200 gp)
text: You inscribe a series of runes upon the surface of a door or around the border of an entryway. They function as a glyph of warding (blast glyph), though unlike a glyph of warding, these runes are always visible. The runes count as a glyph of warding for the purpose of what spells can defeat it, placing multiple glyphs in the same area, and so on.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料（价值200gp的精金、钻石、或秘银粉末）
duration_zh: 永久, 直至能量发散 (可解消)
spellResistance_zh: 否 (物体) 和 可; 见文本
text_zh: 你在门面或入口的边框上描绘出一系列的符文。它们的功能就像守卫刻文（爆裂刻文），尽管与守卫刻文不同，这些守卫符文总是可见的。在判定有什么法术可以挫败本法术，将多重刻文放在相同位置等方面，这些符文被视为守卫刻文。
